content: It's all over between us.
ipaTranscription: ˈɪts ˈɔl ˈoʊvɚ bɪtwˈin ˈʌs
arpabetTranscription: ɪts ɔːl oʊvɚ bᵻtwiːn ʌs

content: A small forest brook flowed between the moss-covered trees.
ipaTranscription: ə smˈɔl fˈɔɹɪst bɹˈʊk flˈoʊd bɪtwˈin ðə mˈɔs kˈʌvɚd tɹˈiz
arpabetTranscription: ɐ smɔːl fɔːɹɪst bɹʊk floʊd bᵻtwiːn ðə mɔs kʌvɚd tɹiːz

content: The two countries have a lot in common culturally.
ipaTranscription: ðə tˈu kˈʌntɹiz hˈæv ə lˈɑt ˈɪn kˈɑmən kˈʌlt͡ʃɚəli
arpabetTranscription: ðə tuː kʌntɹiz hæv ɐ lɑːt ɪn kɑːmən kʌltʃɚɹəli

content: There is much in common between the two countries culturally.
ipaTranscription: ðˈɛɹ ˈɪz mˈʌt͡ʃ ˈɪn kˈɑmən bɪtwˈin ðə tˈu kˈʌntɹiz kˈʌlt͡ʃɚəli
arpabetTranscription: ðɛɹ ɪz mʌtʃ ɪn kɑːmən bᵻtwiːn ðə tuː kʌntɹiz kʌltʃɚɹəli

content: Culturally, the two countries have a lot in common.
ipaTranscription: kˈʌlt͡ʃɚəli | ðə tˈu kˈʌntɹiz hˈæv ə lˈɑt ˈɪn kˈɑmən
arpabetTranscription: kʌltʃɚɹəli ðə tuː kʌntɹiz hæv ɐ lɑːt ɪn kɑːmən

content: Culturally, there is much common ground between the two countries.
ipaTranscription: kˈʌlt͡ʃɚəli | ðˈɛɹ ˈɪz mˈʌt͡ʃ kˈɑmən ɡɹˈaʊnd bɪtwˈin ðə tˈu kˈʌntɹiz
arpabetTranscription: kʌltʃɚɹəli ðɛɹ ɪz mʌtʃ kɑːmən ɡɹaʊnd bᵻtwiːn ðə tuː kʌntɹiz

content: Culturally speaking, the two countries have a lot in common.
ipaTranscription: kˈʌlt͡ʃɚəli spˈikɪŋ | ðə tˈu kˈʌntɹiz hˈæv ə lˈɑt ˈɪn kˈɑmən
arpabetTranscription: kʌltʃɚɹəli spiːkɪŋ ðə tuː kʌntɹiz hæv ɐ lɑːt ɪn kɑːmən

content: Don't make me do that.
ipaTranscription: dˈoʊnt mˈeɪk mˈi dˈu ðˈæt
arpabetTranscription: doʊnt meɪk miː duː ðæt

content: Two don't fight if one doesn't want to.
ipaTranscription: tˈu dˈoʊnt fˈaɪt ˈɪf wˈʌn dˈʌzənt wˈɔnt tə
arpabetTranscription: tuː doʊnt faɪt ɪf wʌn dʌzənt wɔnt tuː

content: Two day returns to Norwich, please.
ipaTranscription: tˈu dˈeɪ ɹɪtˈɚnz tə nˈɔɹwɪt͡ʃ | plˈiz
arpabetTranscription: tuː deɪ ɹᵻtɜːnz tə nɔːɹɪtʃ pliːz

content: Two months have passed since he left for France.
ipaTranscription: tˈu mˈʌnθs hˈæv pˈæst sˈɪns hˈi lˈɛft fɚ fɹˈæns
arpabetTranscription: tuː mʌnθs hæv pæst sɪns hiː lɛft fɔːɹ fɹæns

content: Two persons were killed when an elevated bike path collapsed in Rio.
ipaTranscription: tˈu pˈɚsənz wɚ kˈɪld wˈɛn ən ˈɛləvˌeɪtɪd bˈaɪk pˈæθ kəlˈæpst ˈɪn ɹˈioʊ
arpabetTranscription: tuː pɜːsənz wɜː kɪld wɛn ɐn ɛlɪveɪɾᵻd baɪk pæθ kəlæpst ɪn ɹiːoʊ

content: Two men had their arms severed in Taiwan after a tug-of-war accident.
ipaTranscription: tˈu mˈɛn hˈæd ðˈɛɹ ˈɑɹmz sˈɛvɚd ˈɪn tˈaɪwˈɑn ˈæftɚ ə tˈʌɡ əv wˈɔɹ ˈæksədənt
arpabetTranscription: tuː mɛn hæd ðɛɹ ɑːɹmz sɛvɚd ɪn taɪwɑːn æftɚɹ ɐ tʌɡ ʌv wɔːɹ æksɪdənt

content: Two small rabbits, a white rabbit and a black rabbit, lived in a large forest.
ipaTranscription: tˈu smˈɔl ɹˈæbɪts | ə wˈaɪt ɹˈæbɪt ˈænd ə blˈæk ɹˈæbɪt | lˈɪvd ˈɪn ə lˈɑɹd͡ʒ fˈɔɹɪst
arpabetTranscription: tuː smɔːl ɹæbɪts ɐ waɪt ɹæbɪt ænd ɐ blæk ɹæbɪt lɪvd ɪn ɐ lɑːɹdʒ fɔːɹɪst

content: Are you still in doubt about what I have said?
ipaTranscription: ˈɑɹ jˈu stˈɪl ˈɪn dˈaʊt əbˈaʊt wˈʌt ˈaɪ hˈæv sˈɛd ‖
arpabetTranscription: ɑːɹ juː stɪl ɪn daʊt ɐbaʊt wʌt aɪ hæv sɛd

content: Two singles to Bristol, please.
ipaTranscription: tˈu sˈɪŋɡəlz tə bɹˈɪstəl | plˈiz
arpabetTranscription: tuː sɪŋɡəlz tə bɹɪstəl pliːz

content: Which group is your friend in?
ipaTranscription: wˈɪt͡ʃ ɡɹˈup ˈɪz jˈʊɹ fɹˈɛnd ˈɪn ‖
arpabetTranscription: wɪtʃ ɡɹuːp ɪz jʊɹ fɹɛnd ɪn

content: When will the resurrection be?
ipaTranscription: wˈɛn wˈɪl ðə ɹˌɛzɚˈɛkʃən bˈi ‖
arpabetTranscription: wɛn wɪl ðə ɹᵻsɚɹɛkʃən biː

content: Which club do you belong to?
ipaTranscription: wˈɪt͡ʃ klˈʌb dˈu jˈu bɪlˈɔŋ tə ‖
arpabetTranscription: wɪtʃ klʌb duː juː bᵻlɔŋ tuː

content: My previous boss was a woman.
ipaTranscription: mˈaɪ pɹˈiviəs bˈɔs wəz ə wˈʊmən
arpabetTranscription: maɪ pɹiːviəs bɔs wʌzɐ wʊmən

content: At the table sat a man, a woman, and a girl.
ipaTranscription: ˈæt ðə tˈeɪbəl sˈæt ə mˈæn | ə wˈʊmən | ˈænd ə ɡˈɚl
arpabetTranscription: æt ðə teɪbəl sæt ɐ mæn ɐ wʊmən ænd ɐ ɡɜːl

content: People eat frankfurters, meatballs and potato salad on New Year's Eve in Finland.
ipaTranscription: pˈipəl ˈit fɹˈæŋkfɚtɚz | mˈitbˌɔlz ˈænd pətˈeɪtoʊ sˈæləd ˈɔn njˈu jˈɪɹz ˈiv ˈɪn fˈɪnlənd
arpabetTranscription: piːpəl iːt fɹæŋkfɜːɾɚz miːtbɔːlz ænd pəteɪɾoʊ sæləd ɔn nuː jɪɹz iːv ɪn fɪnlənd

content: No room is currently available.
ipaTranscription: nˈoʊ ɹˈum ˈɪz kˈɚəntli əvˈeɪləbəl
arpabetTranscription: noʊ ɹuːm ɪz kɜːɹəntli ɐveɪləbəl

content: Fuck the universe.
ipaTranscription: fˈʌk ðə jˈunəvˌɚs
arpabetTranscription: fʌk ðə juːnɪvɜːs

content: There's often rice or pasta for lunch.
ipaTranscription: ðˈɛɹz ˈɔftən ɹˈaɪs ˈɔɹ pˈɑstə fɚ lˈʌnt͡ʃ
arpabetTranscription: ðɛɹz ɔfən ɹaɪs ɔːɹ pɑːstə fɔːɹ lʌntʃ

content: Lunch is often rice or pasta.
ipaTranscription: lˈʌnt͡ʃ ˈɪz ˈɔftən ɹˈaɪs ˈɔɹ pˈɑstə
arpabetTranscription: lʌntʃ ɪz ɔfən ɹaɪs ɔːɹ pɑːstə

content: Fortunately, Tom did not get seriously hurt.
ipaTranscription: fˈɔɹt͡ʃənɪtli | tˈɑm dˈɪd nˈɑt ɡˈɛt sˈɪɹiəsli hˈɚt
arpabetTranscription: fɔːɹtʃənətli tɑːm dɪdnɑːt ɡɛt sɪɹiəsli hɜːt

content: Fortunately, Tom survived the accident.
ipaTranscription: fˈɔɹt͡ʃənɪtli | tˈɑm sɚvˈaɪvd ðə ˈæksədənt
arpabetTranscription: fɔːɹtʃənətli tɑːm sɚvaɪvd ðɪ æksɪdənt

content: We ate pancakes and maple syrup for breakfast.
ipaTranscription: wˈi ˈeɪt pˈæŋkˌeɪks ˈænd mˈeɪpəl sˈɚəp fɚ bɹˈɛkfəst
arpabetTranscription: wiː eɪt pæŋkeɪks ænd meɪpəl sɪɹʌp fɔːɹ bɹɛkfəst

content: To my surprise, the anthropologist was accused of murder.
ipaTranscription: tə mˈaɪ səpɹˈaɪz | ðə ˌænθɹəpˈɑləd͡ʒɪst wəz əkjˈuzd əv mˈɚdɚ
arpabetTranscription: tə maɪ sɚpɹaɪz ðɪ ænθɹəpɑːlədʒɪst wʌz ɐkjuːzd ʌv mɜːdɚ

content: Every why has its because.
ipaTranscription: ˈɛvɹi wˈaɪ hˈæz ˈɪts bɪkˈʌz
arpabetTranscription: ɛvɹi waɪ hɐz ɪts bɪkʌz

content: Everything's good at home.
ipaTranscription: ˈɛvɹiθˌɪŋz ɡˈʊd ˈæt hˈoʊm
arpabetTranscription: ɛvɹɪθɪŋz ɡʊd æt hoʊm

content: A skull shaped asteroid flew by the Earth on Halloween.
ipaTranscription: ə skˈʌl ʃˈeɪpt ˈæstɚˌɔɪd flˈu bˈaɪ ðə ˈɚθ ˈɔn hˌæləwˈin
arpabetTranscription: ɐ skʌl ʃeɪpt æstɚɹɔɪd fluː baɪ ðɪ ɜːθ ɔn hæloʊiːn

content: I felt embarrassed at first.
ipaTranscription: ˈaɪ fˈɛlt ɪmbˈɛɹəst ˈæt fˈɚst
arpabetTranscription: aɪ fɛlt ɛmbæɹəst æt fɜːst

content: First you squander your health to acquire money; then your money to get your health back.
ipaTranscription: fˈɚst jˈu skwˈɑndɚ jˈʊɹ hˈɛlθ tə əkwˈaɪɚ mˈʌni | ðˈɛn jˈʊɹ mˈʌni tə ɡˈɛt jˈʊɹ hˈɛlθ bˈæk
arpabetTranscription: fɜːst juː skwɑːndɚ jʊɹ hɛlθ tʊ ɐkwaɪɚ mʌni ðɛn jʊɹ mʌni tə ɡɛt jʊɹ hɛlθ bæk

content: I have something to do first.
ipaTranscription: ˈaɪ hˈæv sˈʌmθɪŋ tə dˈu fˈɚst
arpabetTranscription: aɪ hæv sʌmθɪŋ tə duː fɜːst

content: We need a plan first.
ipaTranscription: wˈi nˈid ə plˈæn fˈɚst
arpabetTranscription: wiː niːd ɐ plæn fɜːst

content: Tom was the only one who came to the party.
ipaTranscription: tˈɑm wəz ðə ˈoʊnli wˈʌn hˈu kˈeɪm tə ðə pˈɑɹti
arpabetTranscription: tɑːm wʌzðɪ oʊnli wʌn huː keɪm tə ðə pɑːɹɾi

content: The Tuaregs begin their day by milking their goats.
ipaTranscription: ðə t͡ʃuˈɑɹəɡz bɪɡˈɪn ðˈɛɹ dˈeɪ bˈaɪ mˈɪlkɪŋ ðˈɛɹ ɡˈoʊts
arpabetTranscription: ðə twɑːɹɹɛɡz bɪɡɪn ðɛɹ deɪ baɪ mɪlkɪŋ ðɛɹ ɡoʊts

content: Lemons are usually sour.
ipaTranscription: lˈɛmənz ˈɑɹ jˈuʒəli sˈaʊɚ
arpabetTranscription: lɛmənz ɑːɹ juːʒuːəli saʊɚ

content: How do you tighten a screw, clockwise or counterclockwise?
ipaTranscription: hˈaʊ dˈu jˈu tˈaɪtən ə skɹˈu | klˈɑkwˌaɪz ˈɔɹ kˌaʊntɚklˈɑkwaɪz ‖
arpabetTranscription: haʊ duː juː taɪʔn̩ ɐ skɹuː klɑːkwaɪz ɔːɹ kaʊntɚklɑːkwaɪz

content: Put your shoes on.
ipaTranscription: pˈʊt jˈʊɹ ʃˈuz ˈɔn
arpabetTranscription: pʊt jʊɹ ʃuːz ɔn

content: Don't make such a sour face!
ipaTranscription: dˈoʊnt mˈeɪk sˈʌt͡ʃ ə sˈaʊɚ fˈeɪs ‖
arpabetTranscription: doʊnt meɪk sʌtʃ ɐ saʊɚ feɪs

content: Why don't we all take off our shoes?
ipaTranscription: wˈaɪ dˈoʊnt wˈi ˈɔl tˈeɪk ˈɔf ˈaʊɚ ʃˈuz ‖
arpabetTranscription: waɪ doʊnt wiː ɔːl teɪk ɔf aʊɚ ʃuːz

content: Get your clothes on.
ipaTranscription: ɡˈɛt jˈʊɹ klˈoʊðz ˈɔn
arpabetTranscription: ɡɛt jʊɹ kloʊðz ɔn

content: Take your shoes off.
ipaTranscription: tˈeɪk jˈʊɹ ʃˈuz ˈɔf
arpabetTranscription: teɪk jʊɹ ʃuːz ɔf

content: Put your shoes on.
ipaTranscription: pˈʊt jˈʊɹ ʃˈuz ˈɔn
arpabetTranscription: pʊt jʊɹ ʃuːz ɔn

content: Censorship is not always a bad thing.
ipaTranscription: sˈɛnsɚʃˌɪp ˈɪz nˈɑt ˈɔlwˌeɪz ə bˈæd θˈɪŋ
arpabetTranscription: sɛnsɚʃɪp ɪz nɑːt ɔːlweɪz ɐ bæd θɪŋ

content: Time is not money. - Time is life.
ipaTranscription: tˈaɪm ˈɪz nˈɑt mˈʌni ‖ tˈaɪm ˈɪz lˈaɪf
arpabetTranscription: taɪm ɪz nɑːt mʌni taɪm ɪz laɪf

content: Time is a mystery.
ipaTranscription: tˈaɪm ˈɪz ə mˈɪstɚi
arpabetTranscription: taɪm ɪz ɐ mɪstɚɹi
